DOC.brief_summary: The overarch goal propose study determine effective outreach method design recruit improve acceptance high-risk HIV-negative YBMSM initiate PrEP identify modify psychosocial structural predictor PrEP acceptance . Specifically , objective pilot study test feasibility motivational interview-based intervention design improve PrEP acceptance among YBMSM .
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study PrEP Acceptance Among Young Black MSM
DOC.detailed_description: The study occur conjunction standard clinical practice , include offer high-risk YBMSM PrEP . If person accepts offer person provided service , person ask participate propose study . Indeed , study design men initially refuse offer . Thus , refuse researcher offer study enrollment . For accept offer enroll , researcher conduct baseline assessment randomize I ( intervention ) versus C ( control ) . Volunteers receive I C condition immediately . The intervention condition call MI-PrEP . This one-hour motivational interviewing-based , one-to-one session help YBMSM think go PrEP . The control condition one-hour , theory-based , one-to-one session help YBMSM think use condom consistently correctly every sex partner . This program currently test Crossroads , know Focus Future . Both condition ( I C ) include provision free condom lubricant - select buffet condom lubricant design offer men broad selection high quality product optimize `` fit feel '' condom sex . After receive I C condition , researcher collect extensive contact information volunteer explain participant researcher make contact week next 4 week , time researcher would like participant return complete second computer-assisted self-administered survey . Thus , approximately 4 week ( later six week ) study enrollment , volunteer return clinic second assessment . At time , second formal offer PrEP clinician make ( note : participant may accept initial offer time point ) . For person accept offer PrEP time , researcher follow standard care procedure administer PrEP . Nonetheless , person remain study 6 month elapse since enrollment occur . At conclusion 6-month period , blood collect test PrEP level plus self-reported adherence measure collect follow-up computer-assisted self-interview give .
